_header: For thee man I suffer shame
Subjects: Christ, sufferings of; sermons, verse in
_description: What Christ suffered — one couplet in a Good Friday sermon on Amore langueo, possibly by John Bromyard

CULKk424.Transcription:
ffor þe man y suffred schamewoo & peyne & gret
                    blame
CULKk424.Note:
Sermon titled dominica in passione vel in die parasceue (p.
                        144v).

OxfBal149.Transcription:
For þe man y suffre schameWo & peyne & gret
                    blame

OxfMagd93.Transcription: y for the man suffre shamewoo and peyne and grete blame
OxfMagd93.Note:
Written as prose in a Latin homily, ‘Amore
                    Langueo’.

TCD277.Transcription:
for þe I sufferd schamewo & payne & mekyll
                    blame
TCD277.Note:
Sermon titled sermo de passione Cristi in die parasceus facienda
                    (added, p. 185).
